text: Mike Walker reports … Hunky Matthew Perry looked dumbstruck when a young female fan rushed to gush how “ hot and hip ” he ’ d looked on TV — figuring she must be talking about his days playing Chandler on “ Friends ” … but the chick chugged on about his terrific recent TV guest shot with his fiancée! Chuckled My Friendly Spy : “ Baffled, Matt protested he isn ’ t engaged — but the lass persisted, saying, ‘ You even talked about it, and she was right there — that cute blonde with the pixie! Matthew Perry : Friends - Less And Talking To Himself! Then you sang a ‘ punky ’ song with your rock band on Stephen Colbert ’ s late night TV show! You ’ re Joe Scarborough, right? ’ That ’ s when
